subject: Bombs and Explosives
lead_paragraph: Two street vendors, Lance Orton and Duane Jackson, were honored at Citi Field for the role they played in thwarting the effort to set off a car bomb in Times Square.
snippet: Two street vendors, Lance Orton and Duane Jackson, were honored at Citi Field for the role they played in thwarting the effort to set off a car bomb in Times Square.
